newsitem.title: USA: Compuware tools used by Oracle.
newsitem.headline: Compuware tools used by Oracle.

text.p: Compuware Corp and Oracle Corp said Monday Compuware's automated testing tools have been adopted by Oracle's applications and consulting services divisions.
The tools are part of Compuware's QACenter family of software, which includes client/server automated testing tools, mainframe testing tools, test-process management tools and testing services.

Oracle Applications division intends to use the Compuware products to develop a suite of benchmark load tests on hardware and software applications, the companies said, and Oracle Consulting Services division will use the tools to implement Oracle Applications products more efficiently.
